name: Peercoin Tracker
body:
Peercoin-Tracker ================

This is an unofficial D7 PPC mining pool tracking application. This chrome extension allows you to enter your API key found in your "Account" page of your D7 mining account and track various aspects of your workers, pool, and balance. You can download the extension on the Chrome Web Store

The application allows you to track:

  • Account Balance
  • Unconfimed Balance
  • Hash rate
  • Current Workers
  • Pool Stats
  • Recent Blocks

Planned features:

  • BTCe Price checking through BTCe API
  • Possible CSV export for spread sheeds
  • Integration with other pools for shared stats

Known Bugs

  • The hashrate is sometimes not the proper amount, this is on D7's end
Important Links ===============

This application is not affilaited with the D7 mining pool or Peercoin directly and is made purely for your convenience. It is a work in progess but feel free to poke around the code, fork, whatever you like. Also report bugs and suggest features

  • This extension was created by: CMDann.ca
  • Source Code: GitHub
  • Pool stats by: D7 Mining Pool
  • Peercoin site: Peercoin
